String.name: Speed Boost
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODAumenta a velocidade de movimento fora de combate.$COLOR_END$BR[Aumento de velocidade] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento fora de combate em $value.

String.name: Speed Boost
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODAumenta a velocidade de movimento fora de combate.$COLOR_END$BR[Aumento de velocidade] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento fora de combate em $value.

String.name: Speed Boost
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODAumenta a velocidade de movimento fora de combate.$COLOR_END$BR[Aumento de velocidade] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento fora de combate em $value.

String.name: Merciless Leap
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODAumenta o dano do leaping Strike.$COLOR_END$BR[Salto sem misericórdia.] Seu Leaping Strike causa 5x mais dano contra inimigos derrubados.

String.name: Staggering Riposte
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODStaggering Counter ativado.$COLOR_END$BR[Resposta Desnorteante] Quando for atingido, você pode contra-atacar com Staggering Counter.

String.name: Delete_Shield Counter I
String.tooltip: Gain a chance to counterattack while using Stand Fast. You cannot be knocked down or stunned, and you take only half damage while using this skill.

String.name: Delete_Shield Counter II
String.tooltip: Gain a chance to counterattack while using Stand Fast. You cannot be knocked down or stunned, and you take only half damage while using this skill.

String.tooltip: Gain a chance to counterattack while using Stand Fast. You cannot be knocked down or stunned, and you take only half damage while using this skill.

String.tooltip: Gain a chance to counterattack while using Stand Fast. You cannot be knocked down or stunned, and you take only half damage while using this skill.

String.tooltip: Gain a chance to counterattack while using Stand Fast. You cannot be knocked down or stunned, and you take only half damage while using this skill.

String.name: Hold the Line
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRestores stamina and draws more aggro.$COLOR_END$BRSuccessful Stand Fasts recovers 50 Stamina and gains 1% additional aggro. Additional aggro can stack up to 20 times, but will disappear on being successfully hit.

String.name: Leash: Master's Leash
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMaster's Leash ativado.$COLOR_END$BRYou can follow up with the Master's Leash skill after you use Leash.

String.name: Merciless Leap
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODAumenta o dano do leaping Strike.$COLOR_END$BR[Salto sem misericórdia] Seu Leaping Strike causa 5x mais dano contra inimigos derrubados.

String.name: Icy Veins
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODUsing In Cold Blood resets cooldowns.$COLOR_END$BRIn Cold Blood resets the cooldowns for Heart Thrust, Knockdown Strike, and Whirlwind.

String.name: Knockdown Strike Boost
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases Knockdown Strike damage.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases damage to multiple targets with Knockdown Strike.

String.name: Whirlwind Intensity
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases Whirlwind damage.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases damage to multiple targets with Whirlwind.

String.name: Merciless Leap
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODAumenta o dano do leaping Strike.$COLOR_END$BR[.Salto sem misericórdia] Seu Leaping Strike causa 5x mais dano contra inimigos derrubados.

String.name: Amok
String.tooltip: [Temporary] Berserker_Ultimate Blow I

String.name: Opportunity Knocks
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases damage to monsters targeting someone else.$COLOR_END$BRDo additional damage to any monster that is currently focused on another player.

String.name: Cyclone Intensity
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases Cyclone damage.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases damage to multiple targets with Cyclone.

String.name: Fireblast Intensity
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODAumenta o dano do Fireblast.$COLOR_END$BR [Intensidade da Explosão de fogo] Aumenta o dano do Fireblast contra múltiplos alvos.

String.name: Flame Pillar Intensity
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODAumenta o dano do Flame Pillar.$COLOR_END$BR[Intensidade do Pilar de Chamas] Aumenta o dano do Flame Pillar contra múltiplos alvos.

String.name: Opportunity Knocks
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases damage to monsters targeting someone else.$COLOR_END$BRDo additional damage to any monster that is currently focused on another player.

String.name: Indomitable Spirit
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODLessens PVP damage.$COLOR_END$BRWhen your HP is below 30%, you take $value% less damage from other players.

String.name: Resilience of Body
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRegenerates HP upon resurrection.$COLOR_END$BRHeals you continuously after you're resurrected.

String.name: Nomadic Crafter
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases armor crafting speed.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases crafting speed for armor by $value.

String.name: Resilience of Mind
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRegenerates MP upon resurrection.$COLOR_END$BRRestores your MP continuously after you're resurrected.

String.name: Coalescence
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases energy gathering speed.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases gathering speed for essence.

String.name: Dirty Fighting
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases crit rate from behind.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases crit rate by 1% when you attack the target from behind.

String.name: Weaponforger
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases weapon crafting speed.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases crafting speed for weapons by $value.

String.name: Light Landing
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODDecreases falling damage.$COLOR_END$BRDecreases falling damage by $value.

String.name: No Stranger to Pain
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODLessens PvP damage.$COLOR_END$BRDecreases PvE and PvP damage taken by $value when your HP is below 30%.

String.name: Blood of Dragons
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases resistance to periodic damage.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases resistance to periodic damage by $value.

String.name: Prospector
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases ore gathering speed.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases ore gathering speed.

String.name: Botanist
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases plant gathering speed.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases plant gathering speed.

String.name: Friendly Current
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases swimming speed.$COLOR_END$BRYour swimming speed is faster than other races.

String.name: Indefatigable
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODKeeps stamina above 20%.$COLOR_END$BRYour Stamina does not fall below 20%.

String.name: Gather No Moss
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases resistance to stun.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases resistance to stun by $value.

String.name: Time-Lost Techniques
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases weapon crafting speed.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases crafting speed for weapons by $value.

String.name: Veil of Shadows
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRevival.$COLOR_END$BRYou do not die when you take lethal damage. Instead, you are knocked down, and enter the veil of shadows, where you immediately regain 15% of your HP. While in the veil, all damage is reduced by 50% but you cannot recover HP normally. You recover up to 30% of max HP when the effect ends. Veil of Shadows will only activate once every 10 minutes.

String.name: Vampiric Whipsaw
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRecovers HP with each hit.$COLOR_END$BRRecover 1.5% of your total HP every time you hit a target with Whipsaw.

String.name: Brutal Smite
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases Smite damage against knocked-down targets.$COLOR_END$BRDoubles the damage dealt with Smite when attacking knocked-down targets.

String.name: Increases attack speed
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases attack speed.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases attack speed by $value.

String.name: Increases crit rate
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases crit rate.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases crit rate by $value.

String.name: More Aggro
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases aggro.$COLOR_END$BRYour attacks draw $value more aggro.

String.name: More Damage Against Bosses
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases damage to boss monsters.$COLOR_END$BRDo $value more damage when you attack boss monsters.

String.name: Less Damage from Bosses
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODReduces damage from boss monsters.$COLOR_END$BRDamage from boss monsters decreases by $value.

String.name: Speed Boost
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODAumenta a velocidade de movimento.$COLOR_END$BR[Aumento de velocidade] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em $value.

String.name: Increases Healing
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases healing.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases healing $value.

String.tooltip: Absorbs up to $value damage with your defensive skill.

String.name: Collective Nature
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODGain additional gold.$COLOR_END$BRGain 1% more gold off the ground.

String.name: Union Mission
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODGain additional credits.$COLOR_END$BRGain 5% more reputation credits from dailies.

String.name: Hard Core
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases stun resistance.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases stun resistance by 5%.

String.name: Tenacious Aura
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODImmunity to stun and knockdown.$COLOR_END$BRImmunity to stun and knockdown effects for allies near the assault commander. (Only activates in alliance territory during alliance conflicts.)

String.name: Enduring Aura
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases endurance.$COLOR_END$BRSignificantly increases endurance for allies near the defense commander. (Only activates in alliance territory during alliance conflicts.)

String.name: Wholehearted Aura
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases Stamina.$COLOR_END$BRContinuously increases Stamina for allies near the adjunct commander. (Only activates in alliance territory during alliance conflicts.)
